name: Cipac
desc: Merchant from the Stadium of the Sacred Flame.

imgDesc.text: Stadium of the Sacred Flame - Natlan

customize.name: Grainfruit Chips
customize.desc: Crispy triangular chips. After being scooped out of the oil-filled pot, the deep-fried chips are drizzled with sauce, sprinkled with cheese, and finally topped with shredded meat — thus is a hearty Natlan breakfast born.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Fried Shrimp Beanballs
customize.desc: A deep-fried snack. First, deep fry the bean flour balls, then stuff them with fillings, fried shrimp, and sauce. Though they may be slightly complicated to prepare, the fact that they're so delicious makes it all worth it.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Saurus Crackers
customize.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. Light, crispy, sweet, and fragrant, with adorable patterns on top to boot — how could the people of Natlan not be won over by such delectable snacks? Apparently, even the Saurians love 'em... But are crackers really the type of thing Saurians eat?

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Saurus Crackers: Tepetlisaurus
customize.desc: Crackers shaped like little Saurians. The enticing aroma of butter draws forth the delightful, irresistible interplay between the Cacahuatl and Grainfruit, while the cute shapes make them truly hard to put down... Be that as it may, you received these treats on the parade of blessings and it might be nicer to keep them as an uneaten memento.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.
